TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCell extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElement

summary.span: 定義 內之內容儲存格的非固定格式內容項目。

span.span: A flow content element that defines a cell of content within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目是直接裝載內容的唯一資料表項目。The element is the only table element that directly hosts content. 其他資料表項目 (， ， ，和) 來定義資料表的結構化屬性存在。Other table elements (, , , and ) exist to define the structural attributes of a table. 項目可能會裝載一或多個動態內容項目衍生自。 elements may host one or more flow content elements deriving from . 有效的內容項目，如包括：Valid content elements for a include: - - - - - 集合類別提供了功能使用的集合物件。The collection class provides facilities for working with collections of objects. > [!NOTE] > 沒有內建的資料繫結的內容。There is no built in data binding for the contents of a . 加入資料繫結功能的最簡單選項會將資料繫結中您如下所示： ``The simplest option for adding data binding functionality to a is to put a data bound in your like this: ``

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 項目中內容的相對流向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員，用來指定相對流向。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 取得這個屬性會傳回目前有效的流向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 設定此屬性會導致 項目的內容依指示的方向重新流動。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字方向的內容通常會對應到所表示之語言的固有流向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯來文和阿拉伯文提供由右至左的語言的範例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英文、 德文與俄文提供由左到右的語言的範例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. **注意：** 這個屬性的值不會自動變更為符合作業系統所使用的語言。**Note:** The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果您需要使用不同的值，則預設值是，您必須指定它自己。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定每行內容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 指定行高的雙精度浮點數值 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.

value.span: 必須等於或大於0.0034而且等於或小於160000。

span.span: must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值為(相當於屬性值的"自動」) 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更行包含文字的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了這個屬性，版面配置中的行受到其屬性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

exception.span: 如果嘗試將 設為非正數的值，就會引發。

span.span: Raised if an attempt is made to set to a non-positive value.
